name: Restify
desc: Restify is a validator on the VeChain network. We are a team of developers and engineers who are passionate about building decentralized applications and services on the VeChain network.

name: VeChain Foundation
location: City of San Marino, San Marino
desc: VeChain Foundation operates the VeChainThor public blockchain and runs a secure, reliable validator to support the network and its ecosystem.
